name: Soar (Techxorcist, alzariss, Callumwagstaff, DanLord, Various Breads)
name_original: Soar (Techxorcist, alzariss, Callumwagstaff, DanLord, Various Breads)
description:
Discover a world frozen in ice. Destroy the terraformers to thaw the world and reveal what is hidden. Each beacon lowers the freezers defences, ready to be destroyed. Best played with gamepad. Soar is a spaceship exploration game with light combat. The more terraformers you destroy, the more the world comes back to life.


Sounds used:
https://freesound.org/people/MATRIXXX_/sounds/444855/

https://freesound.org/people/typeoo/sounds/521492/

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/mega-game-music-collection

Music pack purchased prior to jam start, used for backing track on menu and in game
